title: What can you do when your day starts bad and goes on like that until the evening? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can go for a jog, ride your bike, do yoga, etc. Getting your body active can help you take your mind off of whatever is bothering you and release negative energy.
Look for related posts on Quora and seek inspiration. Reading related articles has helped me out in such situations, a lot of times.
